overview: A classic Israeli song describing the creation of the world (Genesis). It portrays the beauty of nature—sky, sea, sun, and fruit—as divine gifts given to humanity to guard and cherish.

lyrics.english: In the beginning there was sky
In the beginning the sea was blue
In the beginning I had day and night
Many hours of blue
In the beginning was the earth
Soft grass as a gift to her
In the beginning
A garden in Eden, a garden without a gate
Good rain poured down from the heavens
God was merciful at dawn
And for safekeeping, He gave you to me
To me, you to me
In the beginning I had the sun
In the beginning birds sang to me
In the beginning the fruit ripened by evening
Strawberries and berries
I had night

lyrics.hebrew: הרוחות ניגנו שיר ערש לי ולך
lyrics.transliteration: Haruchot nignu shir eres li velach
lyrics.english: The winds played a lullaby for me and for you

overview: A dialogue between a person and God about the cycle of sin and repentance. The singer admits to running away and making excuses, expressing a deep desire to finally do God's will sincerely, 'once and for all'.

lyrics.hebrew: שוב הרגע הזה, אני אתה ויצרי
lyrics.transliteration: Shuv harega haze, ani ata veyitzri
lyrics.english: Again this moment, me, You, and my impulse

lyrics.hebrew: אין לי פנים להפנות יותר, גם לא תירוצים
lyrics.transliteration: Ein li panim lefahnot yoter, gam lo terutzim
lyrics.english: I have no face to turn anymore, nor excuses

lyrics.hebrew: הלכתי לאיבוד בתוך שוק הומה אדם
lyrics.transliteration: Halachti leibud betoch shuk home adam
lyrics.english: I got lost inside a busy market
Deep within the depths of the sea

lyrics.hebrew: אבל אני יודע שלא תתייאש ממני לעולם
lyrics.transliteration: Aval ani yodea shelo tityayesh mimeni leolam
lyrics.english: But I know You will never despair of me

lyrics.hebrew: שוב נסתי מפניך כמו אדיוט ברחתי להרים
lyrics.transliteration: Shuv nasti mipanecha kmo idiot barachti leharim
lyrics.english: Again I fled from You, like an idiot I ran to the mountains

lyrics.hebrew: בניתי מסביבי חומות מגדלים חדרי חדרים
lyrics.transliteration: Baniti misavivi chomot migdalim chadrei chadarim
lyrics.english: I built around myself walls, towers, rooms within rooms
The truth is, I am ashamed and embarrassed
There is nothing hidden from You
Living and existing King
And I want to do Your will as You wish
Truly and innocently, once and for all

lyrics.hebrew: בלי מסכים בלי מסכות בלי לרצות לרצות
lyrics.transliteration: Bli masachim bli masechot bli lirtzot lirtzot
lyrics.english: Without screens, without masks, without wanting to want
Truly and innocently, once and for all

lyrics.hebrew: שוב הרגע הזה , אני ליבי ובשרי
lyrics.transliteration: Shuv harega haze, ani libi uvesari
lyrics.english: Again this moment, me, my heart and my flesh

lyrics.hebrew: אין לי מילים להגיד יותר גם לא חרוזים
lyrics.transliteration: Ein li milim lehagid yoter gam lo charuzim
lyrics.english: I have no more words to say, nor rhymes

lyrics.hebrew: הנה פרטתי את עצמי בפניך לפרוטות
lyrics.transliteration: Hine parateti et atzmi befanecha liprotot
lyrics.english: Here I have broken myself down before You into pennies

lyrics.hebrew: מדבר גבוהה גבוהה , אבל עושה מעט מאוד
lyrics.transliteration: Medaber gevoha gevoha, aval ose me'at me'od
lyrics.english: Speaking very high (loftily), but doing very little
And I returned to my bad ways, and I erred in saying

lyrics.hebrew: ששוב לא אחטא ואשוב ,לא אחטא ואשוב
lyrics.transliteration: Sheshuv lo echete ve'ashuv, lo echete ve'ashuv
lyrics.english: That I will not sin again and repeat, not sin and repeat
And somehow You enabled me again (to repent)

overview: A powerful song about finding God in everything—both the beautiful and the difficult. Mooki sees God in love, hate, uncertainty, and loneliness, expressing a lack of fear because God is within him.

lyrics.english: You are the earth, You are the life
You are the creation, You are the years
You are the faceless love
You are in hatred and in the lack of reality
You are in jealousy and in uncertainty
In the nothingness of being, the emptiness of days
When I breathe, when I touch
Open my eyes, look and know
Hearing a truth clean of words
I know You, God
I am not afraid of You
I want to meet You so much
I have no doubt in You
You are in me and I am in You
Just don't let me forget
In the dust of the roads, in the break of the storm
When the sky falls, in the great silence
In those longings, for some distant land
Behind the infinite, and around the corner
In the fleeting existence that is mostly waiting
In the punch of the loss of faith
At the end of the fear of dying and the next mistake
In the tendency for addiction and the loneliness of routine
In the next opportunity, in the possibility to take off
I know You, God

overview: Based on Psalm 137, this is the eternal vow of the Jewish people never to forget Jerusalem. It is sung at weddings and times of remembrance, pledging that Jerusalem remains the 'head of our joy'.

lyrics.english: If I do not raise
And if I do not raise
Jerusalem
Above my highest joy
Above, above my highest joy
If I forget you, O Jerusalem
Let my right hand forget (its skill)
Let my tongue stick to the roof of my mouth
If I do not remember you
If I forget Jerusalem
Let my right hand forget
Let my tongue stick to the roof of my mouth
If I do not remember you

overview: A song about a broken heart that feels like a stormy sea. Ribo expresses that only God can heal this pain, turn mourning into dancing ('convert my eulogy to forgiveness'), and purify the mundane.

lyrics.english: My heart is torn in two

lyrics.hebrew: מָה שֶׁלֹּא רָאֲתָה שִׁפְחָה עַל הַמַּיִם
lyrics.transliteration: Ma shelo ra'ata shifcha al hamayim
lyrics.english: What a handmaid did not see at the water
Like a storm from the sea, it strikes
Like Miriam's drum, it beats
And there is no cure in the world
My heart raises its hands (surrenders)

lyrics.hebrew: כְּבָר מוֹעֵד לֹא עוֹמֵד עַל הָרַגְלַיִם
lyrics.transliteration: Kvar moed lo omed al haraglayim
lyrics.english: Already stumbling, not standing on its feet

lyrics.hebrew: שֶׁבֶר כְּלִי שֶׁאֵין בּוֹ כְּבָר מָה
lyrics.transliteration: Shever kli she'ein bo kvar ma
lyrics.english: A broken vessel that has nothing left in it
And the heavens are a wall to me
How will I cross through the sea on dry land
And only You can
Turn my eulogy into dancing (forgiveness)
Purify the sand (mundane)
Soften everything in me

lyrics.hebrew: וְרַק אַתָּה מֵבִין אֵיךְ לָגֶשֶׁת לַלֵּב שֶׁלִּי
lyrics.transliteration: Verak ata mevin eich lageshet lalev sheli
lyrics.english: And only You understand how to approach my heart
Soothing every pain in me
Heals the heart
Half is guilty and half is for the sake of Heaven
And there is another enemy that troubles the flock
And there is no messenger to cry out to the Rock

lyrics.hebrew: רַק אֲנִי מוּל יָם שָׁלֵם וְלֵב שָׁבוּר
lyrics.transliteration: Rak ani mul yam shalem velev shavur
lyrics.english: Only me facing a whole sea and a broken heart

title_english: Hine Yamim Baim (Here Come the Days)
overview: Based on the prophecy of Amos, this song speaks of a spiritual hunger. It says days are coming when people will not be hungry for bread or water, but for the word of God and truth.

lyrics.english: Reckless in deeds, hasty in movements

lyrics.hebrew: אין עוד פנאי להמתין ולא זמן לחכות
lyrics.transliteration: Ein od pnai lehamtin velo zman lechakot
lyrics.english: No more leisure to wait and no time to wait
The decline of the generations

lyrics.hebrew: כנראה הסיבה לעליית התורות בקופה הראשית
lyrics.transliteration: Kanire hasiba la'aliyat hatorot bakupa harashit
lyrics.english: Probably the reason for the rising lines at the main checkout
We heard torches and saw the voices
The mountain smoking for God's sake
How is this heart still sleeping
In line for the main checkout
Mists of purity
Not by might and not by power
Only by Name and Kingdom

lyrics.hebrew: כשזה יבוא זה יבוא זה יבוא
lyrics.transliteration: Ksheze yavo ze yavo ze yavo
lyrics.english: When it comes, it comes, it comes
With no room for mistakes

lyrics.hebrew: הנה ימים באים נאום ה׳ אלוקים
lyrics.transliteration: Hine yamim baim ne'um Adonai Elokim
lyrics.english: Behold days are coming, says the Lord God
Not a hunger for bread
Not a thirst for water
Uncircumcised of lips, hollow of tablets
If to find merit for us
It is on the will to change
To remove masks
Time for the revelation of the face

lyrics.hebrew: רק דיבורים של אמת המשביעים את הלב
lyrics.transliteration: Rak diburim shel emet hamasbi'im et halev
lyrics.english: Only words of truth that satisfy the heart

overview: A central text from the Passover Haggadah. It reminds us that in every generation, enemies rise against the Jewish people, but God saves them from their hands. Razel's melody made it a modern classic.

lyrics.english: And it is this [promise] that has stood
For our fathers and for us
And it is this [promise] that has stood
For our fathers and for us
For not just one alone
Has stood against us to destroy us
For not just one alone
Has stood against us to destroy us
But in every generation
They stand against us to destroy us
But in every generation
They stand against us to destroy us
And the Holy One, Blessed be He, saves us from their hand
And the Holy One, Blessed be He, saves us from their hand

overview: A soulful ballad about wandering in Jerusalem and finding the Gate of Mercy. It describes a simple man seeking meaning and redemption, declaring that life ultimately has a purpose.

lyrics.english: Walking around the Old City
And noise comes from every corner
I already know the way
On the way to the Gate of Mercy
I don't look around
I don't listen
I am a dreamer
And so it always was
But I already know the way
On the way to the Gate of Mercy
Live once, only once
There is meaning, there is no meaning
With strength, without strength
Gate of Mercy
Come with me together
Come from within the fear
Because you, you are also part
Of the Gate of Mercy
The signs above the shops
Overlook the streets

lyrics.hebrew: בתוך ליבי יש צעקה והיא גדולה
lyrics.transliteration: Betoch libi yesh tze'aka vehi gdola
lyrics.english: Inside my heart there is a scream and it is big
Show me the Gate of Mercy

overview: A deeply emotional prayer song where the singer calls out 'Hear O Israel' to God in a moment of distress ('when the heart cries'), asking for strength and believing that only God can help.

lyrics.english: When the heart cries, only God hears
The pain rises from within the soul
A man falls before he sinks
Cutting the silence with a small prayer

lyrics.hebrew: שמע ישראל אלוהי, אתה הכל יכול
lyrics.transliteration: Shma Yisrael Elohai, ata hakol yachol
lyrics.english: Hear O Israel, my God, You are omnipotent

lyrics.hebrew: נתת לי את חיי, נתת לי הכל
lyrics.transliteration: Natata li et chayay, natata li hakol
lyrics.english: You gave me my life, You gave me everything
A tear in my eyes, the heart cries quietly
And when the heart is silent, the soul screams

lyrics.hebrew: שמע ישראל אלוהי, עכשיו אני לבד
lyrics.transliteration: Shma Yisrael Elohai, achshav ani levad
lyrics.english: Hear O Israel, my God, now I am alone

lyrics.hebrew: חזק אותי אלוהי, עשה שלא אפחד
lyrics.transliteration: Chazek oti Elohai, ase shelo efchad
lyrics.english: Strengthen me my God, make it so I won't fear
The pain is great and there is nowhere to run

lyrics.hebrew: עשה שיגמר כי לא נותר בי כוח
lyrics.transliteration: Ase sheyigamer ki lo notar bi koach
lyrics.english: Make it end because I have no strength left
When the heart cries, time stands still

lyrics.hebrew: האדם רואה את כל חייו פתאום
lyrics.transliteration: Ha'adam roe et kol chayav pitom
lyrics.english: A man sees his whole life suddenly

lyrics.hebrew: אל הלא נודע הוא לא רוצה ללכת
lyrics.transliteration: El halo noda hu lo rotze lalechet
lyrics.english: To the unknown he does not want to go
Calling to his God on the edge of the abyss

overview: A pop anthem based on the morning prayer of gratitude. It expresses thanks for the new day, for sanity, and for the ability to smile, acknowledging that everything belongs to God.

lyrics.english: I give thanks every morning
That You returned my soul
I give thanks for the clothing
That You placed on my body

lyrics.hebrew: שלא יהיה לי קר, אתה שומר עליי
lyrics.transliteration: Shelo yihiye li kar, ata shomer alay
lyrics.english: So I won't be cold, You watch over me
I give thanks every morning
For the light, for my very being
I give thanks for the bread
That You placed on my table

lyrics.hebrew: שלא אהיה רעב, שלא אדע כאב
lyrics.transliteration: Shelo eheyeh ra'av, shelo eda ke'ev
lyrics.english: That I won't be hungry, that I won't know pain

lyrics.hebrew: על אין ספור חיוכיי, מודה אני
lyrics.transliteration: Al ein sfor chiyuchai, modeh ani
lyrics.english: For my countless smiles, I give thanks

lyrics.hebrew: על כל כישרונותיי, ועל כל שיריי
lyrics.transliteration: Al kol kishronotai, ve'al kol shirai
lyrics.english: For all my talents, and for all my songs
I will dedicate them all to You
Know this, know this
That I give thanks to You
I will shout to You, mighty is Your Name
To You I call, God
To You my life is Yours, my heart and my gratitude
To You I call, God
To You I call, God
I give thanks every morning

lyrics.hebrew: על כוחי, על אבי ועל אימי
lyrics.transliteration: Al kochi, al avi ve'al imi
lyrics.english: For my strength, for my father and for my mother
I give thanks for the rain
That You gave in my fields
To care for my loved ones, You gave me

overview: A deeply spiritual cry asking who truly understands pain and who can heal a broken heart. It reflects a longing for God's embrace and a promise that one will not surrender to despair.

lyrics.english: Who knows every pain
Who is a doctor for the brokenhearted
Creator of light and darkness
Maker of peace and war
Who sits on the throne of judgment
Covers Himself in mercy
Pardons and forgives
Looks and knows
And who will heal my heart
For whom do I yearn
Like a sea that has no shore
Just tell me who
Who will hug me and promise
That I will not surrender in the end
Who was, is, and will be
Who brings death and gives life
Opens His hands
Grows wings

title_english: Lecha Eli Teshukati (To You My God is My Desire)
overview: A famous liturgical poem (Piyut) written by Abraham Ibn Ezra. Meir Banai composed this moving melody for it. It expresses the soul's total devotion and desperate longing for God, pledging body and spirit to Him.

lyrics.hebrew: לך אלי תשוקתי, בך חשקי ואהבתי
lyrics.transliteration: Lecha Eli teshukati, becha cheshki ve'ahavati
lyrics.english: To You my God is my desire, in You is my longing and my love

lyrics.hebrew: לך לבי וכליותי, לך רוחי ונשמתי
lyrics.transliteration: Lecha libi vechilyotai, lecha ruchi venishmati
lyrics.english: To You is my heart and my thoughts, to You is my spirit and my soul

lyrics.hebrew: לך ידי לך רגלי וממך היא תכונתי
lyrics.transliteration: Lecha yadai lecha raglai umimcha hi tchunati
lyrics.english: To You are my hands, to You my feet, and from You is my character

lyrics.hebrew: לך עצמי לך דמי ועורי עם גוויתי
lyrics.transliteration: Lecha atzmi lecha dami ve'ori im geviyati
lyrics.english: To You is my self, to You my blood, and my skin with my body
To You are my eyes and my ideas, and my form and my structure

lyrics.hebrew: לך רוחי לך כוחי ומבטחי ותקוותי
lyrics.transliteration: Lecha ruchi lecha kochi umivtachi vetikvati
lyrics.english: To You is my spirit, to You my strength, my trust and my hope

lyrics.hebrew: לך אהמה ולא אדמה עדי תאיר את אפלתי
lyrics.transliteration: Lecha eheme velo edme adei ta'ir et afelati
lyrics.english: To You I will yearn and not be silent until You light up my darkness

lyrics.hebrew: לך אזעק בך אדבק עדי שובי לאדמתי
lyrics.transliteration: Lecha ez'ak becha edbak adei shuvi le'admati
lyrics.english: To You I will cry, to You I will cling, until I return to my earth

lyrics.hebrew: לך מלכות לך גאות, לך תאות תהילתי
lyrics.transliteration: Lecha malchut lecha ge'ut, lecha ta'avat tehilati
lyrics.english: To You is the kingdom, to You the pride, to You the desire of my praise

lyrics.hebrew: לך עזרה בעת צרה, היה עזרי בצרתי
lyrics.transliteration: Lecha ezra be'et tzara, heye ezri betzarati
lyrics.english: Yours is the help in time of trouble, be my help in my trouble

lyrics.hebrew: ומה אני ומה חיי ומה כחי ועוצמתי
lyrics.transliteration: Uma ani uma chayai uma kochi ve'otzmati
lyrics.english: And what am I, and what is my life, and what is my strength and power

lyrics.hebrew: כקש נדף מאוד נהדף ואיך תזכור משוגתי
lyrics.transliteration: Kekash nidaf me'od nehedaf ve'eich tizkor meshugati
lyrics.english: Like a driven straw, pushed away, so how will You remember my error

lyrics.hebrew: ואור גנוז לפניך יהי סתרי וסוכתי
lyrics.transliteration: Ve'or ganuz lefanecha yehi sitri vesukati
lyrics.english: And a hidden light before You, let it be my hiding place and my shelter

lyrics.hebrew: ותחת צל כנפיך תנה נא את מחיצתי
lyrics.transliteration: Vetachat tzel knafecha tna na et mechitzati
lyrics.english: And under the shadow of Your wings, please place my partition

overview: An uplifting anthem about Teshuva (repentance/return). It reassures the listener that it's never too late to change, that 'the train to the neighborhood' is always running, and that God (the Father) is always waiting to help us return.

lyrics.english: The time has come to wake up
To leave everything, to overcome

lyrics.hebrew: לשוב הביתה לא לחפש מקום אחר
lyrics.transliteration: Lashuv habaita lo lechapes makom acher
lyrics.english: To return home, not to look for another place
The time has come to change
Even if we missed a few stations

lyrics.hebrew: אפשר לרדת יש רכבת חזרה לשכונות
lyrics.transliteration: Efshar laredet yesh rakevet chazara lashchunot
lyrics.english: You can get off, there is a train back to the neighborhoods

lyrics.hebrew: הכל אפשר רק אם נרצה , המחפש תמיד מוצא
lyrics.transliteration: Hakol efshar rak im nirtze, hamechapes tamid motze
lyrics.english: Everything is possible only if we want, the seeker always finds

lyrics.hebrew: גם אם הוא נמצא אי שם הרחק בקצה
lyrics.transliteration: Gam im hu nimtza ei sham harchek bakatze
lyrics.english: Even if he is located somewhere far away at the edge

lyrics.hebrew: דלתות שמיים לא ננעלו ,כשהבן קורא הצילו
lyrics.transliteration: Dlatot shamayim lo nin'alu, kshehaben kore hatzilu
lyrics.english: The doors of heaven are not locked, when the son calls 'Save me'
Then Father in Heaven comes regardless
Even though we did something bad
He pardons and forgives, pardons and forgives
And extends His hand to help and gives in His mercy
The power to fix and return to Him
The time has come to regret
If you're going to run, then run from sin

lyrics.hebrew: אם כבר לקחת אז לקחת בשביל לתת
lyrics.transliteration: Im kvar lakachat az lakachat bishvil latet
lyrics.english: If you're going to take, then take in order to give

lyrics.hebrew: וזה הזמן להתקרב לא לפחד מהכאב
lyrics.transliteration: Veze hazman lehitkarev lo lefached mehake'ev
lyrics.english: And this is the time to come close, not to fear the pain

lyrics.hebrew: ואם לתת אז כבר לתת מכל הלב
lyrics.transliteration: Ve'im latet az kvar latet mikol halev
lyrics.english: And if to give, then give with all your heart

title_english: Ma Ata Rotze Mimeni (What Do You Want From Me)
overview: A raw conversation with God where Hanan asks for protection from his own ego ('guard me from myself'). He complains about 'empty prayers' and demands a real, tangible connection with God—a hug, a look in the eyes—asking God to fulfill the promise of being the light in the darkness.

lyrics.english: Guard me from myself
Keep me real (authentic)
All the prayers are empty words
We've been silent enough, speak now
What do You want from me
What? What?

lyrics.hebrew: מי ביקש ממך לזרוק בי נשמה
lyrics.transliteration: Mi bikesh mimcha lizrok bi neshama
lyrics.english: Who asked You to throw a soul into me
Why won't You come to me in the afternoon
Hug me, look me in the eyes
You promised that You would always be
The light at the edge of the darkness
A piano in the sand, can't take it anymore
I've tried enough, now it's Your turn
What do You want from me

overview: Unlike the standard prayer, this is Meir Ariel's personal, poetic interpretation. He thanks God for everything—the good, the bad, and the truth—describing a serene morning scene where the future approaches softly while his loved one smiles in her sleep.

lyrics.english: I give thanks
Before You and to You

lyrics.hebrew: על כל החסד והאמת והטובה והרעה והטובה
lyrics.transliteration: Al kol hachesed veha'emet vehatova vehara'a vehatova
lyrics.english: For all the grace and the truth and the good and the bad and the good
That You did with me
And with my household

lyrics.hebrew: ועם קרובי וידידי ועם בני עמי
lyrics.transliteration: Ve'im krovai veyedidai ve'im bnei ami
lyrics.english: And with my relatives and friends and with my people

lyrics.hebrew: ועם ארצי, ועם כל העולם והאדם
lyrics.transliteration: Ve'im artzi, ve'im kol ha'olam veha'adam
lyrics.english: And with my land, and with the whole world and mankind
That You created
Secretly, quietly quietly
Slowly slowly, tapping
Futures, futures toward us
And you smile at me from within the sleep

lyrics.hebrew: יהיה לנו טוב, טוב מטוב, טוב מאוד
lyrics.transliteration: Yihye lanu tov, tov mitov, tov me'od
lyrics.english: We will have good, better than good, very good
It begins already in the morning, in the morning
You laugh at me
From within, from within the sleep

title_english: Mashgiach Min HaChalonot (Watching from the Windows)
overview: Based on Song of Songs, this song emphasizes God's constant, hidden presence. Even when He seems to hide His face ('Mastir Panim'), He is still peeking through the cracks, watching over us, and planning our redemption.

lyrics.english: His hand is never too short
For His kindness is forever
And it is impossible to describe His power
Nor His strength and His love
Where is the place of His glory
And there is no end to His beauty and majesty
Where is the place of His glory to admire Him
If we ask, we will surely be able to find Him
Watching from the windows
Fulfills all the dreams
And even when He hides His face
He is still peeking through the cracks
And He will turn in His mercy to His children
And without Him, who will be a Father to us
He will return and redeem us again
And put an end to our troubles

overview: A masterpiece recreating the Yom Kippur service in the Holy Temple. It follows the High Priest (Kohen Gadol) as he purifies himself, enters the Holy of Holies, and counts the prayers, while the people bow in awe at the mention of God's holy name.

lyrics.english: He entered the place that he entered
And stood in the place that he stood
Washed his hands and his feet
Immersed, ascended, and dried himself
Came from the place he came from
And went to the place he went to
Removed the weekday clothes
Put on white clothes
And thus he would say

lyrics.hebrew: אנא ה' כפר לחטאים לעוונות ולפשעים
lyrics.transliteration: Ana Hashem kaper lachata'im la'avonot velapsha'im
lyrics.english: Please God, atone for the sins, iniquities, and transgressions
That I have sinned before You, I and my household
And the priests and the people standing in the courtyard

lyrics.hebrew: כשהיו שומעים את שם השם המפורש
lyrics.transliteration: Kshehayu shom'im et shem Hashem hameforash
lyrics.english: When they would hear the explicit Name of God
Coming out of the mouth of the High Priest

lyrics.hebrew: היו כורעים משתחווים ונופלים על פניהם
lyrics.transliteration: Hayu kor'im mishtachavim venoflim al pneihem
lyrics.english: They would kneel, bow, and fall on their faces

lyrics.hebrew: ברוך שם כבוד מלכותו לעולם ועד
lyrics.transliteration: Baruch shem kvod malchuto le'olam va'ed
lyrics.english: Blessed be the Name of His glorious kingdom forever and ever

overview: A modern song weaving together stories of famous righteous figures (Tzadikkim) like the Tzemach Tzedek, Rabbi Shimon Bar Yochai, and Rabbi Akiva. It connects their struggles and faith to modern life, asking for strength and a lack of fear.

lyrics.english: The Tzemach Tzedek once told the Hasidim
About his grandfather, the Ba'al HaTanya
That he never broke things
Even a box of tobacco
So but in life

lyrics.hebrew: רק אל תשבור אותי רק תפנק אותי
lyrics.transliteration: Rak al tishbor oti rak tefanek oti
lyrics.english: Just don't break me, just pamper me

lyrics.hebrew: ורבי שמעון בר יוחאי זה החיים
lyrics.transliteration: VeRabbi Shimon Bar Yochai ze hachayim
lyrics.english: And Rabbi Shimon Bar Yochai is life

lyrics.hebrew: ישב ולמד תורה במשך שלוש עשרה שנים
lyrics.transliteration: Yashav velamad Torah bemeshech shlosh esre shanim
lyrics.english: Sat and learned Torah for thirteen years

lyrics.hebrew: הוריד לנו את הזוהר ת'סודות של אלוקים
lyrics.transliteration: Horid lanu et haZohar t'sodot shel Elokim
lyrics.english: Brought down the Zohar to us, the secrets of God

lyrics.hebrew: האור פה כל כך גבוה זה אור של משוגעים
lyrics.transliteration: Ha'or po kol kach gavoha ze or shel meshuga'im
lyrics.english: The light here is so high, it's a light of crazy people
The whole world is a very narrow bridge
And the main thing is not to fear
Give me strength to get through the day
Not to fear tomorrow
And he rose early in the morning

lyrics.hebrew: וייקח את בנו את יחידו אשר אהב
lyrics.transliteration: Vayikach et bno et yechido asher ahav
lyrics.english: And took his son, his only one, whom he loved

lyrics.hebrew: השם אמר לו לך תקריב אותו עכשיו
lyrics.transliteration: Hashem amar lo lech takriv oto achshav
lyrics.english: God said to him, go sacrifice him now
He didn't hesitate, didn't get bummed out

lyrics.hebrew: הוא לא חשב, הוא לא חשב
lyrics.transliteration: Hu lo chashav, hu lo chashav
lyrics.english: He didn't think, he didn't think

lyrics.hebrew: אל תשלח ידך אל הנער אל תשלח, אל תשלח
lyrics.transliteration: Al tishlach yadcha el hana'ar al tishlach, al tishlach
lyrics.english: Do not send your hand to the boy, don't send, don't send

lyrics.hebrew: אל תעשה לו מהומה שרה לא שרדה את הצער
lyrics.transliteration: Al ta'ase lo me'uma Sarah lo sarda et hatza'ar
lyrics.english: Do not do anything to him, Sarah didn't survive the sorrow

lyrics.hebrew: לא שרדה, לא שרדה שרה אמא נשמה
lyrics.transliteration: Lo sarda, lo sarda Sarah ima neshama
lyrics.english: Didn't survive, didn't survive, Sarah, mother, soul
